alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Bryan; Johnston (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 3:12AM CST until November 20 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Johnston County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southern Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 400 AM CST. * At 312 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Coleman, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atoka, Caddo, Milburn, Tushka, Caney, Kenefic, Lane, Fillmore, Coleman, Nida, northeastern Lake Texoma, Bentley, McGee Creek Lake, Boggy Depot Park, and Darwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
